value.title: DalOverflow
value.description: A clone of Stack Overflow for Dalhousie Students. Developed under guidance of Professor Tushar Sharma.

value.title: HireLocalPros
value.description: A user-friendly website that offers a hassle-free way for individuals to discover and engage with nearby service providers.

value.title: Trivia Titans
value.description: An online trivia game for friends to signup using their google accounts and play numerous games online creating team stats and engaging in tournaments. Developed using cloud services provided by AWS and GCP

value.title: Notes Distribution System
value.description: A comprehensive course management and note sharing web application for students to register for courses and receive uploaded notes. The instructor gets a dashboard where they can upload images of their handwritten notes. The application extracts text from the image and creates a text file. Registered students receive a downloadable link to this file via email. Developed using AWS cloud services.

value.title: Soil Profile Based Crop Prediction System
value.description: A soil profile based crop prediction system that recommends the crop to be grown based on soil data. It also detects diseases of infected crop from the uploaded images and suggests remedies.

value.title: Music Genre Classification
value.description: A website that detects genre of music uploaded developed using Django.

value.title: Location Based Security
value.description: A mobile application that uses a location dependent approach to share files to registered users. It also offers two factor authentication and sends user an OTP before making the file accessible. The file key is encrypted using Advanced Encryption System before sharing.

value.title: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering
value.location_state: Atharva College of Engineering - Mumbai University

value.title: Diploma in Computer Engineering
value.location_state: Thakur Polytechnic - Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education

value.title: Software Engineer Co-op - Royal Bank of Canada.
description: Architected a scalable web application using Selenium Web driver to automate data validation process for newly onboarded applications on IAM systems and save 120% manual testing time.
Collaborated with team to translate client requirements into design and craft a high-quality scalable automation solution.
Followed SOLID design principles and OOP concepts to write testable code, ensuring reusability for 6+ use-cases.
Tackled tech debt in refactoring sessions with team to modify code base improving performance of build systems by 7%.
Created automation test scripts for multi factor authentication (MFA), saving 3000+ manual hours.
Wrote concise documentation for product delivery, facilitating seamless implementation and adoption by 6 client teams.
Leveraged confluence pages to rapidly learn new technologies and frameworks used in RBCs IAM domain.
Performed regression testing on IAM systems to identify areas of improvement in functionality.

value.title: Full Stack Developer - Strux Inc.
description: Designed and implemented responsive user interfaces using Java, AWS, JavaScript and React framework.
Developed RESTful APIs and integrated them with front-end components to ensure seamless data flow.
Utilized Git version control systems for efficient collaboration and code management.
Regularly updated and maintained existing projects to ensure compatibility with evolving web standards and technologies.
Leveraged AWS concepts (EC2, Elastic Beanstalk, Lambda, API Gateway, Textract, SNS, SQS, S3, DynamoDB) to create event-driven serverless applications, resulting in 30% lower response time.
Translated project stakeholders requirements into features and planned the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) within budget constraints, ensuring successful delivery of high-quality solutions.
Leveraged major cloud providers like AWS and GCP to create applications, resulting in 50% lower operational costs.
Crafted responsive React styled components using HTML5, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap/Material UI, and JavaScript libraries driving 30% surge in user engagement.

value.title: Data Analyst Intern - GeeBee Pvt. Ltd.
description: Implemented database schema for 750+ universities and wrote queries that render results in 0.2 seconds
Developed and executed SQL queries and stored procedures to extract, transform, and load (ETL) data from various sources into the MySQL database.
Ensuring data security and compliance with GDPR by implementing access controls and encryption.
